system.description: You can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.vemj08hawvmf44ya]{Disguise Self} once per long rest. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6q34ttse78toj5x0]{Blindness/Deafness} (blindness only) once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.yaoaihxyt4dlsysw]{Nondetection} once per long rest. You don’t need material components for these spells, and when casting them your spellcasting ability is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (whichever is highest).
